char_info.char_desc: The Siren Who Swims at Fast Speeds

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Where's that orange siren going? I'm demanding an end to this madness.
Whoever I just heard, I have no idea what "madness" you're talking about.
My daughter took me here for a swim in this river.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Ah! There you are! I don't want this hairstyle. How do I get rid of it?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I time traveled with my mom to the Edo Period to swim here.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't understand how you have super long hair. My mother has it...

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I did it for my husband. Same thing goes for Queen Marisa.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Somebody told me that all women are affected by this. I have no clue what may have caused it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If I attempt to restore myself to my former glory, I'll fail.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yes. This is a major incident.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Because we're from the present day, we aren't affected.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There's no way you can make any progress to remove it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Dang it. There should be a way to remove it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: In fact, I should duel you to see if your hair will fall out.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Kagami and I are youkai-borns who can't be sealed away.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This spell was inflicted on me and I have faith this can be reversed.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Hair takes a long time to grow back. My boy Driller doesn't want to see me or my mother bald...
